overview: Paul and Kathy Plunk buy a small motel in a lonesome mountain region in Oregon. Their newfound tranquility is broken by a pair of guests who turn out to be wanted criminals on run from the police. They need money, so they assault the Plunks, force them to withdraw all their money from the bank. But the nightmare just begins as they take the Plunks and their baby with them as hostages.
tagline: He forced his way into her home. He threatened her child. He took her by force. He's a pathological criminal. So why does she feel guilty?
title: Captive
